frontmatter.author: Ajda Pretnar
frontmatter.title: Gene Expression Profiles with Line Plot
frontmatter.shortExcerpt: We show how to explore gene expression profiles with the new Line Plot widget.
frontmatter.longExcerpt: Line Plot shows profiles of data instances – each instance is a line in the plot and its profile are values across all variables in the data. We show how to explore gene expression profiles.
